explanation: [0-0] A man in a black top and blue pants sits in front of the camera, holding a lit black lighter. Behind him is a purple cabinet, and on the purple wall are many photos and a white window.

[0-2] The man then puts his finger on the flame, and the flame magically runs onto his finger. When he moves his finger back to the lighter, the flame returns. He then turns his other hand over, revealing a green lighter in his hand.
